evidence.text: the motion for a preliminary injunction must be denied.

extracted.value: Denied plaintiffs' motion for preliminary injunction (ECF No. 28) on June 4, 2024, finding plaintiffs failed to demonstrate likelihood of success on merits or irreparable harm without relief

evidence.text: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the plaintiffs’ motion for class certification (ECF No. 34) is denied.

extracted.value: Denied plaintiffs' motion for class certification (ECF No. 34) on June 4, 2024, finding plaintiffs failed to satisfy Rule 23(a) commonality, numerosity, typicality, and adequacy requirements

evidence.text: IT IS THEREFORE ORDERED that the defendants' motion for summary judgment is granted. Patrick Kurkowski, Kenneth Dalberg, Edgar Salinas-Leal, Bradley Schmitt, Justin Welch, Ashton Dreiling, John Anderson, and Jayvon Flemming are dismissed as plaintiffs. The plaintiffs' mental health and isolation-related claims are dismissed.

extracted.value: Granted defendants' motion for partial summary judgment (ECF No. 29) on May 23, 2024, dismissing Patrick Kurkowski, Kenneth Dalberg, Edgar Salinas-Leal, Bradley Schmitt, Justin Welch, Ashton Dreiling, John Anderson, and Jayvon Flemming as plaintiffs, and dismissing mental health and isolation-related claims
